AYEAR.desc: Assessment year of ITR form that include prior year information

TOTAL_PROFTS_GAINS_BP.desc: Profits and Gains from Business or Profession

SHORT_TERM_15PER.desc: Profits and Gains from Business or Profession

SHORT_TERM_30PER.desc: Profits and Gains from Business or Profession

SHORT_TERM_APPRATE.desc: Income from short term capital gains taxed at regular rates

LONG_TERM_20PER.desc: Profits and Gains from Business or Profession

form.2017: not used in filing unit tax calculations

Tax_SHORT_TERM_15PER.desc: Tax on Short Term Capital Gains at 15% (Tax_SHORT_TERM_15PER)

Tax_SHORT_TERM_30PER.desc: Tax on Short Term Capital Gains at 30% (Tax_SHORT_TERM_30PER)

Tax_SHORT_TERM_APPRATE.desc: Tax on Short Term Capital Gains at the Regular Rate (Tax_SHORT_TERM_APPRATE)

Total_Tax_STCG.desc: Tax on all Short Term Capital Gains Tax_SHORT_TERM_15PER + Tax_SHORT_TERM_30PER + Tax_SHORT_TERM_APPRATE (Total_Tax_STCG)

Tax_LONG_TERM_10PER.desc: Tax on Long Term Capital Gains at 10% (Tax_LONG_TERM_10PER)

form.2017: ITR-3 Schedule SI sum of lines 3-9

Tax_LONG_TERM_20PER.desc: Tax on Long Term Capital Gains at 20% (Tax_LONG_TERM_20PER)

Total_Tax_LTCG.desc: Tax on all Long Term Capital Gains Tax_LONG_TERM_10PER + Tax_LONG_TERM_20PER (Total_Tax_LTCG)

TI_special_rates.desc: Taxable Total Income (TTI) taxed at special rates

Aggregate_Income.desc: Income taxed at normal rates TTI minus TI_special_rates

tax_Aggregate_Income.desc: Tax liability on Income taxed at normal rates

tax_TI_special_rates.desc: Tax liability on TI taxed at special rates
